problem_text_cn: 如图,平行四边形ABCD中,AB=5,BC=10,BC边上的高AM=4,E为BC边上一个动点(不与B,C重合),过E作直线AB的垂线,垂足为F,FE与DC的延长线相交于点G,连结DE,DF,当点E在线段BC上运动时,△BEF和△CEG的周长之和为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, AB = N_0, BC = N_1, the height of BC edge AM = N_2, E is a moving point on BC(not coincident with B, C), and the perpendicular line of the straight line AB is formed through E , The vertical foot is F, the extended line of FE and DC intersects at point G. Connect DE and DF, when point E moves on the line segment BC, the sum of the perimeters of △BEF and △CEG is ()
raw_answer: 解:过点C作FG的平行线交直线AB于H,因为GF⊥AB,所以四边形FHCG为矩形．所以FH=CG,FG=CH,因此,△BEF与△CEG的周长之和等于BC+CH+BH,∵∠B=∠B,∠AMB=∠BHC=90°∴△ABM∽△CBH,∴\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{AM}{CH},由BC=10,AB=5,AM=4,∴CH=\frac{AM\cdotBC}{AB}=\frac{4×10}{5}=8,在RT△BCH中,BH=√{BC²-CH²}=6,所以BC+CH+BH=24,所以,△BEF与△CEG的周长之和为24；故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了矩形的判定和性质,相似三角形的判定和性质,勾股定理,熟练掌握相似三角形的判定与性质是解题关键．
